SELECT SCM39M.PO_NO ,SCM39M.STOCK_CODE ,SCM39M.STOCK_DESC ,SCM39M.STOCK_TYPE ,NVL(SCM39M.PO_QTY,0) PO_QTY ,NVL(SCM39M.SO_QTY,0) SO_QTY ,NVL(SCM39M.SBO_AP_QTY,0) GI_QTY ,NVL2(SCM39M.SO_DT, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SCM39M.SO_DT,'YYYY/MM/DD'),'DD/MM/YYYY'),'') SO_DATE ,NVL2(SCM39M.GI_DT, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SCM39M.GI_DT,'YYYY/MM/DD'),'DD/MM/YYYY'),'') GI_DATE ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SCM39M.PO_ISSUE_DT,'YYYY/MM/DD'),'DD/MM/YYYY') PO_ISSUE_DATE ,( SELECT SO_NO FROM SCM0042M SCM42M WHERE SCM42M.PO_NO = SCM39M.PO_NO AND ROWNUM =1 ) SO_NO FROM SCM0039M SCM39M WHERE SCM39M.PO_NO = #{poNo}
AND SCM39M.PO_ISSUE_DT >= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{startDate},'DD/MM/YYYY'),'YYYYMMDD') AND SCM39M.PO_ISSUE_DT <= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{endDate},'DD/MM/YYYY'),'YYYYMMDD')

SELECT DISTINCT SCM39M.PO_NO ,SCM39M.STOCK_CODE ,SCM39M.STOCK_DESC ,SCM39M.STOCK_TYPE ,SCM39M.PO_QTY ,SCM42M.SO_NO ,SCM39M.SO_QTY SO_QTY ,SCM42M.PLAN_QTY ,NVL2(SCM42M.PLAN_DT, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SCM42M.PLAN_DT,'YYYY/MM/DD'),'DD/MM/YYYY'),'') PLAN_DT ,SCM42M.PROD_QTY RESULT_QTY ,NVL2(SCM42M.RESULT_DT, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SCM42M.RESULT_DT,'YYYY/MM/DD'),'DD/MM/YYYY'),'') RESULT_DT FROM SCM0039M SCM39M ,SCM0042M SCM42M WHERE SCM39M.PO_NO = #{poNo} AND SCM42M.PO_NO(+) = SCM39M.PO_NO
AND SCM39M.PO_ISSUE_DT >= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{startDate},'DD/MM/YYYY'),'YYYYMMDD') AND SCM39M.PO_ISSUE_DT <= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{endDate},'DD/MM/YYYY'),'YYYYMMDD')

SELECT T0.PO_NO ,T1.STOCK_CODE ,STK.STK_DESC ,NVL(T1.QTY,0) PO_QTY ,NVL(T2.SO_QTY,0) SO_QTY ,NVL(T3.GI_QTY,0) GI_QTY ,T2.SO_DT SO_DATE ,T3.GI_DT GI_DATE ,T0.PO_ISSU_DT PO_ISSUE_DATE ,T2.SO_NO FROM SCM0009M T0 LEFT JOIN SCM0010D T1 ON T1.PO_NO = T0.PO_NO LEFT JOIN SCM0015D T2 ON T2.PO_NO=T1.PO_NO AND T2.STOCK_CODE=T1.STOCK_CODE LEFT JOIN SCM0013D T3 ON T3.SO_NO=T2.SO_NO AND T3.STOCK_CODE=T2.STOCK_CODE JOIN SYS0026M STK ON STK.STK_CODE=T1.STOCK_CODE WHERE T0.PO_NO= #{poNo}

SELECT T0.PO_NO ,T1.STOCK_CODE ,STK.STK_DESC ,T1.QTY PO_QTY ,T2.SO_NO ,NVL(T2.SO_QTY,0) SO_QTY ,NVL(T3.PP_QTY_PLAN,0) PLAN_QTY ,T3.PP_DT_PLAN PLAN_DATE ,NVL(T3.PP_QTY_RESULT,0) RESULT_QTY ,T3.PP_DT_RESULT RESULT_DATE ,T2.SO_DT FROM SCM0009M T0 LEFT JOIN SCM0010D T1 ON T1.PO_NO = T0.PO_NO LEFT JOIN SCM0015D T2 ON T2.PO_NO=T1.PO_NO AND T2.STOCK_CODE=T1.STOCK_CODE LEFT JOIN SCM0014D T3 ON T3.SO_NO=T2.SO_NO AND T3.STOCK_CODE=T2.STOCK_CODE JOIN SYS0026M STK ON STK.STK_CODE=T1.STOCK_CODE WHERE T0.PO_NO = #{poNo}

SELECT TO_CHAR(IF_DT,'mm/dd/yyyy hh12:mm:ss AM') ||' '|| MSG_FROM_HQ LAST_STATE FROM ( SELECT SN , TRGET_YEAR , IF_STUS , IF_DT , MSG_FROM_HQ FROM SCM0025D WHERE TRGET_YEAR = #{targetDateCbBox} ORDER BY SN DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT 'MY' || #{preCdc} || SUBSTR(EXTRACT(year FROM SYSDATE),-2) || EXTRACT(month FROM SYSDATE) || EXTRACT(DAY FROM SYSDATE) || 'A' || DECODE(AA.PO_NO,NULL,'001',(SUBSTR(AA.PO_NO,-3) +1 ) ) NEW_PONO FROM ( SELECT PO_ID,PO_NO,ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( ORDER BY PO_ID DESC) RK FROM SCM0009M WHERE PO_NO NOT LIKE '%WJ%' AND TO_CHAR(CRT_DT,'YYYY') = #{preYear} ) AA WHERE AA.RK = 1

SELECT SCM0010D_SN_SEQ.NEXTVAL AS DETAIL_SEQ ,( SELECT 'MY' || #{preCdc} || SUBSTR(EXTRACT(year FROM SYSDATE),-2) || EXTRACT(month FROM SYSDATE) || EXTRACT(DAY FROM SYSDATE) || 'A' || DECODE(AA.PO_NO,NULL,'001',(SUBSTR(AA.PO_NO,-3) +1 ) ) NEW_PONO FROM ( SELECT PO_ID,PO_NO,ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( ORDER BY PO_ID DESC) RK FROM SCM0009M WHERE PO_NO NOT LIKE '%WJ%' AND TO_CHAR(CRT_DT,'YYYY') = #{preYear} ) AA WHERE AA.RK = 1 ) NEW_PONO FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO SCM0010D ( SN , PO_NO , PO_ITM_NO , STOCK_CODE , QTY , FOB_AMT , PO_ITM_APPV_STUS , CRT_DT , CRT_USER_ID , UPD_DT , UPD_USER_ID , GR_QTY ) VALUES ( #{detailSeq} , #{newPono} , #{poItemNo} , #{stockCode} , #{poQty} , 0 /* FOB_AMT */ , 1 /* PO_ITM_APPV_STUS */ , SYSDATE , NVL(#{crtUserId},'') , SYSDATE , NVL(#{crtUserId},'') , NULL )
mapper.select: SELECT T0.PO_NO , T0.PO_ISSU_DT , T1.STOCK_CODE ITEM_CODE_KOR , T4.STOCK_CODE ITEM_CODE_MAL , '' AS MATERIAL , T2.STK_DESC AS DESCRIPTION , NVL(T3.FOB_PRC,0) AS UNITPRICE , T1.QTY , (NVL(T3.FOB_PRC,0)*NVL(T1.QTY,0)) AS AMOUNT , '' AS REMARK FROM SCM0009M T0 LEFT JOIN SCM0010D T1 ON T1.PO_NO = T0.PO_NO LEFT JOIN SYS0026M T2 ON T2.STK_CODE = T1.STOCK_CODE LEFT JOIN SCM0020M T3 ON T3.STOCK_CODE = T1.STOCK_CODE LEFT JOIN SCM0024M T4 ON T4.STOCK_CODE = T1.STOCK_CODE WHERE T0.PO_NO= '{?V_PO_NO}'
